Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.listeners

Class RecoveryListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.listeners.RecoveryListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextualEgoNetworkListener
    public final class RecoveryListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextualEgoNetworkListener
    This class implements a ContextualEgoNetworkListener that automatically safeguards the contextual ego network from failing to call save() before terminating the application. For the time being, this does not safeguard against keeping unsaved changes on objects obtained of the CrossModuleComponent.getOrCreateInstance(Class).
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis (maniospas@hotmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init​(ContextualEgoNetwork contextualEgoNetwork)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when the listener is added to a contextual ego network. Checks for ensuring that the listener is assigned to only one network (if needed) must be implemented on the respective listener. However, it is not mandatory to keep the network the listener is being added to, as this can be retrieved from the CrossModuleComponent.getContextualEgoNetwork() method of nodes, contexts and edges.
        Specified by:
        init in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        contextualEgoNetwork - The contextual ego network the listener has been added to.

      • onCreateNode

        public void onCreateNode​(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when a new node is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateNode(String, Object) method (after the created node is added to the network).
        Specified by:
        onCreateNode in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        node - The created node.

      • onRemoveNode

        public void onRemoveNode​(Node node)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when a node is removed from the contextual ego network by the ContextualEgoNetwork.removeNodeIfExists(String) method. Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the node is removed from the network. This callback is different than ContextualEgoNetworkListener.onRemoveNode(Context, Node), although the latter will necessarily have been called before reaching this one, as nodes removed from the network are also removed from all contexts first.
        Specified by:
        onRemoveNode in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        node - The removed node.

      • onCreateContext

        public void onCreateContext​(Context context)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when a new context is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateContext(Object) method (after the created context is added to the network).
        Specified by:
        onCreateContext in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        context - The created context.

      • onLoadContext

        public void onLoadContext​(Context context)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when the Context.load() method of a context is called. Note that this method is often called by other methods of the Context class to retrieve the context's data if they have been removed from the memory through Context.cleanup(). The callback is called after all context data are retrieved to memory.
        Specified by:
        onLoadContext in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        context - The loaded context.

      • onSaveContext

        public void onSaveContext​(Context context)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when the Context.save() method of a context is called (after the save has completed). This method is also implicitly called by ContextualEgoNetwork.save() and Context.cleanup() and hence a callback will also be triggered at those times.
        Specified by:
        onSaveContext in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        context - The saved context.

      • onAddNode

        public void onAddNode​(Context context,
                      Node node)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when a node is added to a context (after the node is added).
        Specified by:
        onAddNode in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        node - The node added to the context.

      • onRemoveNode

        public void onRemoveNode​(Context context,
                         Node node)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when a node is removed from a context using the Context.removeNode(Node). That method is also called by the Context.removeNodeIfExists(Node) and ContextualEgoNetwork.removeNodeIfExists(String) methods, so this callback occurs on those operations too. Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the node is removed from the context. If the node has edges, ContextualEgoNetworkListener.onRemoveEdge(Edge) callbacks of those edges will follow.
        Specified by:
        onRemoveNode in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        node - The node just removed from the context.

      • onCreateEdge

        public void onCreateEdge​(Edge edge)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when an edge is created in a context using the Context.addEdge(Node, Node) method (after the edge is created). That method is also called by the Context.getOrAddEdge(Node, Node) method. Note that the context can be retrieved from the edge using the Edge.getContext() method.
        Specified by:
        onCreateEdge in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        edge - The created edge.

      • onRemoveEdge

        public void onRemoveEdge​(Edge edge)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when an is removed from a context using the Context.removeEdge(Node, Node) method. That method is also called by the Context.removeNodeIfExists(Node) and Context.removeNode(Node). Contrary to creation callbacks, this is called before the edge is removed from the context.
        Specified by:
        onRemoveEdge in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to be removed.

      • onCreateInteraction

        public void onCreateInteraction​(Interaction interaction)
        Description copied from interface: ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Called when an interaction is created (after it has been added to an edge). To retrieve the interaction's edge use the Interaction.getEdge() method.
        Specified by:
        onCreateInteraction in interface ContextualEgoNetworkListener
        Parameters:
        interaction - The created interaction.
